prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
Keeping up with rapidly evolving technology trends and distinguishing important developments from daily noise can be challenging for businesses and individuals.

---

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Technology trends, evolving, important developments, daily noise, businesses, individuals, challenges
